name: markus-oberlehner-net
description: Generator for the personal website of Markus Oberlehner
author: Markus Oberlehner

scripts.build: yarn run clean && node scripts/build.js && cp -R resources/images dist && mv dist/images/favicon.ico dist
scripts.build:production: yarn run clean && node scripts/build.js --minify && cp -R resources/images dist && mv dist/images/favicon.ico dist
scripts.publish: yarn run build:production && rsync -avz --delete --exclude=/.* --exclude=/error --exclude=/robots.txt --exclude=/stats --exclude=/google15e4ae9ecda47ac0.html -e ssh dist/ vs0.oberlehner.net:/var/www/markus.oberlehner.net/web
